# tf.contrib.summary.image


<table class="tfo-notebook-buttons tfo-api" align="left">

<td>
  <a target="_blank" href="https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.15/tensorflow/python/ops/summary_ops_v2.py#L804-L820">
    <img src="https://www.tensorflow.org/images/GitHub-Mark-32px.png" />
    View source on GitHub
  </a>
</td></table>



Writes an image summary if possible.

``` python
tf.contrib.summary.image(
    name,
    tensor,
    bad_color=None,
    max_images=3,
    family=None,
    step=None
)
```
